channel.title: Comments on: Standing on the Shoulders of Giants

item.title: By: Raptor
item.dc:creator: Raptor
item.description: Heh, In the fine city of duluth where there's nothing to do besides bars & computer - some guy on Garonna was hospitalized for dehydration - drank down 12packs of soda instead of water eventually & it did him in :)
item.content:encoded: Heh, In the fine city of duluth where there’s nothing to do besides bars & computer – some guy on Garonna was hospitalized for dehydration – drank down 12packs of soda instead of water eventually & it did him in ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mannox
item.dc:creator: Mannox
item.description: When do the /chinese and /subway commands get entered. I can see it now...10% off any order initiated from WoW!
item.content:encoded: When do the /chinese and /subway commands get entered. I can see it now…10% off any order initiated from WoW!

item.title: By: GreenMarine
item.dc:creator: GreenMarine
item.description: Don't forget to protect your child from griefers: http://www.microsoft.com/athome/security/children/griefers.mspx
item.content:encoded:
Don’t forget to protect your child from griefers:
http://www.microsoft.com/athome/security/children/griefers.mspx

item.title: By: ShakaZulu
item.dc:creator: ShakaZulu
item.description: EQ2 is a great game. WoW is a great game. Both are really, really good. Now, EQ2 has no PvP and it is group oriented, but they are working to smooth that out a bit. Yesterday's patch included a ton of solo instance content. Don't dismiss it out of hand. I don't think any reasonable gamer would say it isn't seductive, once you've played it (and I mean, play it past that newbie isle thing and get into Freeport and start doing evil stuff for The Man).
item.content:encoded: EQ2 is a great game. WoW is a great game. Both are really, really good. Now, EQ2 has no PvP and it is group oriented, but they are working to smooth that out a bit. Yesterday’s patch included a ton of solo instance content. Don’t dismiss it out of hand. I don’t think any reasonable gamer would say it isn’t seductive, once you’ve played it (and I mean, play it past that newbie isle thing and get into Freeport and start doing evil stuff for The Man).

item.title: By: Abalieno
item.dc:creator: Abalieno
item.description:
So this giant with piegons on his shoulders is all made of pizza, am I rite? AND THOSE PIEGONS ARE EATING HIM ALIVE!
:D
item.content:encoded:
So this giant with piegons on his shoulders is all made of pizza, am I rite? AND THOSE PIEGONS ARE EATING HIM ALIVE!

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
From what I've read (haven't tried myself), EQ2 isn't (not sure of word here) seductive (?) enough to pull off a gamer kill.
But I will lay down some money that this story will take over where the WoW warrior protest left off. Not quite a day later and /pizza is all over the WoW boards.
item.content:encoded:
From what I’ve read (haven’t tried myself), EQ2 isn’t (not sure of word here) seductive (?) enough to pull off a gamer kill.

But I will lay down some money that this story will take over where the WoW warrior protest left off. Not quite a day later and /pizza is all over the WoW boards.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Time for a dead pool on this one - how long will it be before some hapless pizza delivery guy finds an EQ2 player buried in pizza boxes and fecal matter, with "I told u I wuz hardcore" on the screen?
item.content:encoded: Time for a dead pool on this one – how long will it be before some hapless pizza delivery guy finds an EQ2 player buried in pizza boxes and fecal matter, with “I told u I wuz hardcore” on the screen?

item.title: By: Twist
item.dc:creator: Twist
item.description: There is a commandline application for ordering pizza via Dominoes. If there is a way to make custom commands that interact with the rest of your OS it might be possible to order with it without even leaving the game.
item.content:encoded: There is a commandline application for ordering pizza via Dominoes. If there is a way to make custom commands that interact with the rest of your OS it might be possible to order with it without even leaving the game.
